snippet: Rezwan Ferdaus admitted to planning to blow up the Pentagon and the United States Capitol using remote-controlled planes laden with explosives.
abstract: Rezwan Ferdaus, Massachusetts man who admitted to 2011 plot to blow up Pentagon and the United States Capitol using remote-controlled planes laden with explosives, is sentenced to 17 years in prison.
lead_paragraph: Rezwan Ferdaus admitted to planning to blow up the Pentagon and the United States Capitol using remote-controlled planes laden with explosives.

headline.seo: Rezwan Ferdaus of Massachusetts Gets 17 Years in Terrorist Plot
headline.main: Massachusetts Man Gets 17 Years in Terrorist Plot
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts Man Gets 17 Years in Terrorist Plot
